name: Farm_Friends_Children's_Book_Case
reviews: Perfect addition to my reading nook for the kids!
Love this bookcase. Design is very cute

Shipped fast and packaged very well. There was a strong smell when I first pulled out the parts but it quickly diminished. no biggie. Very easy to put together. My 2 year old enjoyed handling the screwdriver to help me put it together. The farm scene is gorgeous. I thought it would be a cheap looking screen print because of the price I paid but it looks amazing with great detail. Worth every penny!
This is good looking for young children. The top pole cracked with little pressure and the screws broke off. I am keeping it to avoid hassle.
The item is exactly as pictured and just what I expected.
description:
Hand-painted farm scenes decorate this book case on both sides to
display your children's favorite books. Storage pockets are canvas
for easy cleaning. The red and natural color scheme is perfect for
bedrooms, playrooms or classrooms.Materials: MDF, cotton canvasQuantity: One (1) toy boxDimensions: 22 inches wide x 12 inches deep x 24 inches
  highStyleTraditionalMaterialCotton, MDFFinishHand PaintedAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorGreen, MultiFurniture PatternSolidProduct FeaturesIncludes HardwareStorage TypeBookcases and Shelves
